original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na adukkha masukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta
